argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opabiota.1 | |- F = { <. x , y >. | { y | ph } = { y } } |
| 2 |  | opabiota.2 | |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = B -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` B ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_iotabidv | |- ( x = B -> ( iota y ph ) = ( iota y ps ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( x = B -> ( ( F ` x ) = ( iota y ph ) <-> ( F ` B ) = ( iota y ps ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eldm | |- ( x e. dom F <-> E. y x F y ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nfiota1 | |- F/_ y ( iota y ph ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_nfeq2 | |- F/ y ( F ` x ) = ( iota y ph ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_opabiotafun | |- Fun F |
| 11 |  | #P_funbrfv | |- ( Fun F -> ( x F y -> ( F ` x ) = y ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( x F y -> ( F ` x ) = y ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-br | |- ( x F y <-> <. x , y >. e. F ) |
| 14 | 1 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( <. x , y >. e. F <-> <. x , y >. e. { <. x , y >. | { y | ph } = { y } } ) |
| 15 |  | #P_opabid | |- ( <. x , y >. e. { <. x , y >. | { y | ph } = { y } } <-> { y | ph } = { y } ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_3bitri | |- ( x F y <-> { y | ph } = { y } ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ssnid | |- y e. { y } |
| 18 |  | #P_id | |- ( { y | ph } = { y } -> { y | ph } = { y } ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl5eleqr | |- ( { y | ph } = { y } -> y e. { y | ph } ) |
| 20 |  | #P_abid | |- ( y e. { y | ph } <-> ph ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_sylib | |- ( { y | ph } = { y } -> ph ) |
| 22 | 16, 21 | #P_sylbi | |- ( x F y -> ph ) |
| 23 |  | #P_vex | |- y e. _V |
| 24 | 6, 23 | #P_breldm | |- ( x F y -> x e. dom F ) |
| 25 | 1 | #P_opabiotadm | |- dom F = { x | E! y ph } |
| 26 | 25 | #P_abeq2i | |- ( x e. dom F <-> E! y ph ) |
| 27 | 24, 26 | #P_sylib | |- ( x F y -> E! y ph ) |
| 28 |  | #P_iota1 | |- ( E! y ph -> ( ph <-> ( iota y ph ) = y ) ) |
| 29 | 27, 28 | #P_syl | |- ( x F y -> ( ph <-> ( iota y ph ) = y ) ) |
| 30 | 22, 29 | #P_mpbid | |- ( x F y -> ( iota y ph ) = y ) |
| 31 | 12, 30 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( x F y -> ( F ` x ) = ( iota y ph ) ) |
| 32 | 9, 31 | #P_exlimi | |- ( E. y x F y -> ( F ` x ) = ( iota y ph ) ) |
| 33 | 7, 32 | #P_sylbi | |- ( x e. dom F -> ( F ` x ) = ( iota y ph ) ) |
| 34 | 5, 33 | #P_vtoclga | |- ( B e. dom F -> ( F ` B ) = ( iota y ps ) ) |
